content:
In FHIR Release 3 (STU) Questionnaire.item.option indicates that use of valueInteger and valueDate would be possible wih choices; however, elsewhere in the deocumentation choice is limited to use valueCoding. Is this a correct interpretation, ie., there is indeed an inconsistency? If so, would there be a way to represent choice of integer values so that validators would accept it?

pasted image
That was an issue with stu3, it has been corrected in r4, you could double check it now before closes in the next few days.
